name: playful-pixels-
description: A game lobby hosting multiple games.

scripts.install: cd server && npm install && cd client && npm install
scripts.develop: concurrently "cd server && npm run watch" "cd client && npm run watch"
scripts.production: concurrently "cd server && npm run watch" "cd client && npm run watch"
scripts.heroku-postbuild: cd client && npm install && npm run build
